mapper.insert: insert into comcode ( groupcd, code, value, delyn, reg_user, reg_date ) values ( #{groupcd}, #{code}, #{value}, 'N', 'admin', now() )
mapper.select: select groupcd, code, value, delyn, reg_user, reg_date from comcode where groupcd = #{groupcd} and code = #{code}
mapper.update: update comcode set value=#{value}, delyn = #{delyn} where groupcd = #{groupcd} and code = #{code}
update comcode set delyn = "Y" where groupcd = #{groupcd} and code = #{code}
